# wcp-topbar-preview-editor-link-toggle

Toggles all preview editor link plugins to show or hide the debug hints.

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Modifiers | Type                                      | Default                                 |
|-------------|-------------|-----------|-------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------|
| `available` | `available` |           | `boolean`                                 | true                                    |
| `label`     |             | readonly  | `"Toggle all editor link hints globally"` | "Toggle all editor link hints globally" |
| `name`      |             | readonly  | `"editor-link-toggle"`                    | "editor-link-toggle"                    |
